articles.title: Warming temperatures threaten hundreds of fish species the world relies on, study finds

articles.title: Senate approves final sanctions bill to punish China over Hong Kong
articles.description: The US Senate has approved a final version of legislation that would punish China for moves that lawmakers fear will crush democratic freedoms in Hong Kong.

articles.author: Eric Cheung and Philip Wang, CNN
articles.title: Pro-democracy leader Nathan Law leaves Hong Kong
articles.description: Nathan Law, a former lawmaker and prominent pro-democracy activist, has fled Hong Kong, he announced Thursday on Facebook. The news comes days after China's central government imposed a controversial national security law in the territory.

articles.title: Herman Cain is receiving treatment for coronavirus
articles.description: Former 2012 Republican presidential candidate Herman Cain is receiving treatment for coronavirus at an Atlanta-area hospital, according to a statement posted to his Twitter account.

articles.title: It's a scary time to be unemployed. These people still chose to get laid off
articles.description: Wendell Stinnett had been planning to work for at least another four years, maybe even eight. Instead he agreed this summer to walk away from the job he's had for 31 years.
